Articles.Content:
This mod has been abandoned.

 

Edited June 28, 2020 by Dooz
Forum account cleanup.
Very nice! Good job!

Very nice! Good job!

Thanks.
Anyone? Bump?

Hey man, your pics aren't working.

You know the rules, no pics, no clicks!

Pics work for me.

Nice planets. It's a great shame that Planet Factory breaks science archives (and science tree, according to some reports) and thus is unplayable in career mode.

Hey man, your pics aren't working.

You know the rules, no pics, no clicks!

You Clicks the Spoilers And you Get Pics

I did that To decrease Size Of the Post.

Very Nice pack! It is very good and I especially like Polo and Kaisar. They have a "flare" about them. As soon as I can get all my mods under control I will send a mission and if you want to revert the orbit add 180 to the inclination. Hope that helps...
looks neat! will try this out tonight

Verson 0.2 Has been Released!

Changlog

Improved Kaiser's Non Cloudy Look For ones who Don't use the Clouds mod

Made Kaiser Go retrograde Around the Sun.

Made Kaiser A little bit Farther From Moho.

Yeah, they look good, will send out a ship tomorrow or later today..

Edited April 25, 2014 by Larrt_M

So I landed (getting their by cheating I will admit) on Polo. It looks awesome. I have a question, did you Photoshop/gimp the maps for the planets or did you find then on Space Engine?? I have tried to do Laythe derivatives before, however, I have always struggled to get the oceans to line to any shores or colors. Either way, your pack looks amazing!

So I landed (getting their by cheating I will admit) on Polo. It looks awesome. I have a question, did you Photoshop/gimp the maps for the planets or did you find then on Space Engine?? I have tried to do Laythe derivatives before, however, I have always struggled to get the oceans to line to any shores or colors. Either way, your pack looks amazing!

Polo Uses a Space engine Map Because I am Not A graphics Designer And a Height map I just Added Some Cool Colors and Ice caps.

Edited April 25, 2014 by Dooz
Just discovered aerobraking alts if you encounter Kaiser you are going 20km per second use 100k. Pe for aerobraking at Kaiser and should slow you down to enter orbit around kaiser.

Sun going down on Polo. Great planet! Got lots of great pictures, here are a few. Looking forward to driving that rover.

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2610-08-33-60.jpg

Edited April 26, 2014 by Larrt_M

Sun going down on Polo. Great planet! Got lots of great pictures, here are a few. Looking forward to driving that rover.

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2610-08-33-60.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2610-14-39-63.jpg

Nice Job on the Rover And nice Pics

Thanks!

The cloud cover fooled me a bit. I kept moving my landing spot thinking I was going to come down into some kind of fluid, but when things cleared and there was nothing there.

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2609-44-45-16.jpg

Are there oceans on Polo? I guess I could remove the clouds a take a look...

Edited April 26, 2014 by Larrt_M

Thanks!

The cloud cover fooled me a bit. I kept moving my landing spot thinking I was going to come down into some kind of fluid, but when things cleared and there was nothing there.

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2609-44-45-16.jpg

Are there oceans on Polo? I guess I could remove the clouds a take a look...

When i Was Developing Polo's Cloud Cover there where Small Ponds.

Ok, no oceans then, that's good to know! Trying to decide what planet of yours to land on tomorrow. My other lander rover without all those parachutes is being fueled right now.

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2608-40-48-36.jpg

The cloud cover on Polo looks very good, great job! Hope you add more like it..

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2610-04-31-77.jpg

Edited April 26, 2014 by Larrt_M

Update 0.3 has Been Released!

Made Marek the most Outer Moon Due To Issues

Changed Kaiser's Description.

Tested To Make Sure Theres More room For Moons.

Landed onto Kunar (original version). This was more difficult then I thought it would be do to the high planet rotation and fairly high gravity with my two small engines. I made it, but just barely!

I really like the moving cloud bands on Kaiser, they look very cool!

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2708-56-50-54.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2709-09-14-86.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2709-14-59-36.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2709-12-46-09.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2709-22-56-37.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-04-2709-04-48-91.jpg

These new boosters are so good I was able to take enough fuel in my second stage to use it as a tanker. Added a docking port to it and another to the lander and left in orbit so I can top off for the trip home.

Edited April 27, 2014 by Larrt_M

Nice job..
I hope you consider another planet like Polo. That's my new favorite planet!
I'm going to change the textures on 1or two of the moons. Thanks for the permission
